研究发现，更好的心脏健康减慢了大脑衰老并降低痴呆症风险一项JAMA网络开放研究发现，老年人的心血管健康（CVH）更好，与较低的神经退行性生物标志物，尤其是神经丝光链（NFL）有关。这些好处在各个种族之间是一致的，对承担阿尔茨海默氏症相关遗传风险的个人尤其有影响力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250316/better-healt-health-health-slows-nealth-slows-brain-aging-ang-and-ang--------------------------------------------------------------------------- https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250316/better-healt-health-health-slows-brain-gain-aging-ang--ang-and-lowers-dementia--------------------------------------------- https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=01f998f8-9454-4e72-a499-499-486c4150f02b Sun, 16 Mar 2025 22:24:00 -0400 Better heart health slows brain aging and lowers dementia risk, study finds
